item.title: Aligning Large Language Models via Self-Steering Optimization
item.description: New Self-Steering Optimization (SSO) algorithm autonomously generates accurate preference signals for aligning LLMs, eliminating manual annotation and boosting performance.

item.title: Frontiers in Intelligent Colonoscopy
item.description: This study advances intelligent colonoscopy by creating ColonINST, a large multimodal dataset; ColonGPT, a multimodal language model; and a benchmark, pushing the boundaries of AI in colorectal cancer…

item.title: JMMMU: A Japanese Massive Multi-discipline Multimodal Understanding Benchmark for Culture-aware Evaluation
item.description: JMMMU, a new benchmark, rigorously evaluates large multimodal models’ understanding of Japanese language and culture, revealing critical performance gaps and guiding future development.

item.title: Math Neurosurgery: Isolating Language Models' Math Reasoning Abilities Using Only Forward Passes
item.description: Math Neurosurgery precisely isolates math reasoning in LLMs using only forward passes, boosting performance without harming other skills.

item.title: MiniPLM: Knowledge Distillation for Pre-Training Language Models
item.description: MINIPLM: Efficiently pre-train smaller, high-performing language models via offline knowledge distillation, boosting performance across diverse tasks and model architectures.

item.title: PyramidDrop: Accelerating Your Large Vision-Language Models via Pyramid Visual Redundancy Reduction
item.description: PyramidDrop boosts Large Vision-Language Model efficiency by 40% in training and 55% in inference, dropping redundant visual tokens in deeper layers while maintaining performance.

item.title: SpectroMotion: Dynamic 3D Reconstruction of Specular Scenes
item.description: SpectroMotion: groundbreaking 3D reconstruction that accurately renders dynamic specular scenes, outperforming existing methods with its novel combination of 3D Gaussian Splatting, physically-based re…

item.title: 3DGS-Enhancer: Enhancing Unbounded 3D Gaussian Splatting with View-consistent 2D Diffusion Priors
item.description: 3DGS-Enhancer boosts 3D Gaussian splatting’s novel view synthesis by integrating view-consistent 2D diffusion priors, dramatically improving quality in sparse-view scenarios.

item.title: Improve Vision Language Model Chain-of-thought Reasoning
item.description: Boosting vision-language model reasoning: This paper proposes a novel two-fold approach using GPT-4-distilled rationales and reinforcement learning to significantly improve chain-of-thought reasoning …

item.title: LLM-based Optimization of Compound AI Systems: A Survey
item.description: LLMs are revolutionizing compound AI optimization by efficiently generating complex parameters without gradient computation, enabling end-to-end system tuning.

item.title: Mitigating Object Hallucination via Concentric Causal Attention
item.description: Concentric Causal Attention (CCA) tackles LVLMs’ object hallucination by cleverly reducing the distance between visual and instruction tokens, improving multimodal alignment and surpassing existing me…

item.title: xGen-MM-Vid (BLIP-3-Video): You Only Need 32 Tokens to Represent a Video Even in VLMs
item.description: xGen-MM-Vid (BLIP-3-Video) efficiently represents videos using only 32 tokens, achieving state-of-the-art video question answering accuracy with a smaller model size.

item.title: EvoPress: Towards Optimal Dynamic Model Compression via Evolutionary Search
item.description: EvoPress: A novel evolutionary algorithm optimizes dynamic LLM compression, surpassing existing methods in accuracy and efficiency.
